item.title: Emotes!
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

Purpose: To add emotes and change the names

Difficulty: 2/10 3/10

Server base: Any

Classes modified: Client.java

Knowledge: basic java , copy and paste

Parts:
Chap 1 (Making Emotes)
Chap 2 (Changing Emote Names)

  1. Chap 1
    Search in client.java for
case 168: // 1st emote

then you should see something like

case 168: // 1st emote showInterface(3559); break;
where it says showInterface(3559);change that to anything you want so if you want a teleport command you would do thisteleportToX = Xcoord; teleportToY = Ycoord;
if you wanted to add a send message under it you would put

sendMessage("Your Message Here");

If you want to make it a admin only emote such as to tele you somewhere
you would add

if (playerRights >= 2) {

Remember to close the bracket so if you had a admin command using the stuff above it would look like

case 168: // 1st emote if (playerRights >= 2) { teleportToX = Xcoord; teleportToY = Ycoord; sendMessage("Your Message Here"); } else { sendMessage("You Need Admin Pridvilges For This Emote"); } break;
otherwise it would be case 168: // 1st emote teleportToX = Xcoord; teleportToY = Ycoord; sendMessage("Your Message Here"); break;

if you wanted to add tele block to it you would put

case 168: // 1st emote if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("Hahaha Now Where You Gonna Go"); } else if (teleblock == false) { teleportToX = Xcoord; teleportToY = Ycoord; sendMessage("Your Message Here"); } break;

  1. Chap 2
    Search in client.java for
//----Player Controls----

then you should see something like

sendQuest("@red@Player Controls", 154); sendQuest("@whi@Move speed", 158); sendQuest("@bla@Walk", 160); sendQuest("@cya@Run", 159); sendQuest("@red@Energy left:", 148); sendQuest("@red@Auto Retaliate", 155); sendQuest("@cya@On", 157); sendQuest("@gre@Off", 156); sendQuest("@whi@Players Online: @cya@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 174); sendQuest("@whi@", 180); sendQuest("@whi@", 181); sendQuest("@whi@", 178); sendQuest("@cya@Train", 175); // 4 slot sendQuest("@gre@Herb", 177);// 5 slot sendQuest("@whi@Fish", 182);// 6 slot sendQuest("@cya@Slayer", 185);// 7 slot sendQuest("@red@Cape", 186);// 8 slot sendQuest("@whi@Empty", 173);// 9 slot sendQuest("@cya@Shops", 179);// 10 slot sendQuest("@red@Magiks", 187);// 11 slot sendQuest("@gre@PKbox", 176);// 12 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13371);// 13 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13372);// 14 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13373);// 15 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13374);// 16 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13375);// 16 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13376);// 17 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13377);// 17 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13378);// 18 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13379);// 18 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13380);// 19 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13381);// 19 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13382);// 20 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 11102);// 20 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 11103);// 21 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6533);// 21 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6532);// 22 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6540);// 22 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6541);// 23 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 11101);// 23 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6519);// 24 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6522);// 24 slot

now we need to worry about this part

sendQuest("@whi@", 180); sendQuest("@whi@", 181); sendQuest("@whi@", 178); sendQuest("@cya@Train", 175); // 4 slot sendQuest("@gre@Herb", 177);// 5 slot sendQuest("@whi@Fish", 182);// 6 slot sendQuest("@cya@Slayer", 185);// 7 slot sendQuest("@red@Cape", 186);// 8 slot sendQuest("@whi@Empty", 173);// 9 slot sendQuest("@cya@Shops", 179);// 10 slot sendQuest("@red@Magiks", 187);// 11 slot sendQuest("@gre@PKbox", 176);// 12 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13371);// 13 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13372);// 14 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13373);// 15 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13374);// 16 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13375);// 16 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13376);// 17 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13377);// 17 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13378);// 18 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13379);// 18 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13380);// 19 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13381);// 19 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 13382);// 20 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 11102);// 20 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 11103);// 21 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6533);// 21 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6532);// 22 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6540);// 22 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6541);// 23 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 11101);// 23 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6519);// 24 slot sendQuest("@whi@", 6522);// 24 slot
now if you dont have that add it and i labeled them for you
just add in what you like

there you have GL

Credits:

90% me
10% Musicmad441

Read full topic
